text: The Hauler, designed by Zorgon Peterson, is a freighter produced from 3300 to the present. It costs 52,720 CR with an insurance value of 2,636 CR.

The Hauler is a small ship measuring 28.6m x 26.2m x 10.4m, with a hull mass of 14 t. It has a mass lock factor of 6, armor rating of 180, and shield capacity of 65 MJ. Its heat capacity is 123, and it has a fuel capacity of 4 t. The ship has a top speed of 203 m/s (default) or 232 m/s (upgraded), and a boost speed of 305 m/s (default) or 348 m/s (upgraded). Its unladen jump range is 9.87 ly (default) or 37.29 ly (upgraded), with a cargo capacity of 8 t (default) or 26 t (max).

The Hauler is equipped with 2 utility mounts and 1 small hardpoint. It has 3 Class 1 compartments, 1 Class 2 compartment, and 2 Class 3 compartments. The default outfitting includes Lightweight Alloys (Class 1), Power Plant (Class 2), Thrusters (Class 2), Frame Shift Drive (Class 2), Life Support (Class 1), Power Distributor (Class 1), Sensors (Class 1), Fuel Tank (Class 2), Cargo Rack [x4] (Class 2), Shield Generator (Class 2), Advanced Docking Computer (Class 1), Supercruise Assist (Class 1), and PAS (Class 1).
